content: *add to your halloween fun with one of these little wreaths lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70439a skill level easy level 2 lion® wool article #820 2 colors 1 ball each for leaves *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * wool-ease® article #620 1 ball for skull ornament crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers purchased craft wreath 11 in 28 cm in diameter hot glue gun fabric stiffener special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease crochet 14 leaves with a and 7 with b felt the leaves instructions provided work skull in rounds some construction required to finish see also 70464a felted skull 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-skull
